name: Douglas Chew, B.S., E.I.T
resume_snippet: Douglas Chew, B.S., E.I.T  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:	  Mr. Chew has over twenty (20) years of experience in the biotechnology industry.  He has specialized in Project Management, Engineering, Commissioning, Qualification, and Validation (CQV) of process equipment (upstream, downstream, and fill/finish), facilities and utilities.  He has implemented Risk Management practices to streamline the qualification process.  Doug has also managed several capital projects from start to finish.      CORE COMPE
source_file: Active Associates/Chew, Douglas/Chew, Doug AVS CV 061225.docx
